body:
Hi, My previous setup was running fine.
Today I blow up cluster using kube-down.sh and then pull latest source code and built it.

Now while in Kube-up.sh, I see following error. I looked different forums but didn't get satisfactory answer. Any clue?

Adding new image: container-vm-v20141016
INFO: Waiting for insert of image container-vm-v20141016. Sleeping for 3s.
INFO: Waiting for insert of image container-vm-v20141016. Sleeping for 3s.
ERROR: PERMISSIONS_ERROR: Required 'read' permission for 'rawDisk.source'

+---------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
| name                | operation-1414691662772-506a79206b720-de41b0e1-2329281d |
| region              |                                                         |
| zone                |                                                         |
| creation-time       |                                                         |
| status              | DONE                                                    |
| progress            | 100                                                     |
| status-message      |                                                         |
| target              | container-vm-v20141016                                  |
| target-id           |                                                         |
| client-operation-id |                                                         |
| insert-time         | 2014-10-30T10:54:22.932-07:00                           |
| user                |                                 |
| start-time          | 2014-10-30T10:54:23.206-07:00                           |
| end-time            | 2014-10-30T10:54:26.767-07:00                           |
| operation-type      | insert                                                  |
| error-code          | 403                                                     |
| error-message       | FORBIDDEN                                               |
| warning             |                                                         |
| warning-message     |                                                         |
| error               |                                                         |
|   error             | PERMISSIONS_ERROR                                       |
|   message           | Required 'read' permission for 'rawDisk.source'         |
+---------------------+---------------------------------------------------------+
anarla-ny-04359:kubernetes anarla$

labels.description: Highest priority. Must be actively worked on as someone's top priority right now.
labels.name: priority/critical-urgent

title: Kube-up.sh having ERROR: PERMISSIONS_ERROR: Required 'read' permission for 'rawDisk.source'
